content:
The chunk adds a 'Help' menu option with a toggle for enabling/disabling balloon help tooltips, enhancing user interface guidance.

menubar.addmenu('Help', 'Floater Group Help Operations')
        self.toggleBalloonVar = tk.IntVar()
        self.toggleBalloonVar.set(0)
        menubar.addmenuitem('Help', 'checkbutton',
                            'Toggle balloon help',
                            label = 'Balloon Help',
                            variable = self.toggleBalloonVar,
                            command = self.toggleBalloon)
